channel.title: MDS_Omega – Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: Why did they make this weapon so painfully useless? It only kills people if you land a direct hit, but at that point why not just use a sniper or shotgun for a One-Shot kill?
item.dc:creator: MDS_Omega
item.description: Why did they make this weapon so painfully useless? It only kills people if you land a direct hit, but at that point why not just use a sniper or shotgun for a One-Shot kill?
